00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "strings.h"
00010 #include "keywords.h"
00011 #include "compiler.h"

00013 bool importAll(MavenCompiler* c, string import, bool compiling) {
00014         StringList parts = split('.', import);
00015         
00016         // bug #32: use readDirectory()
00017         struct dirent *ep;
00018         string location = combinePaths(c->binDirectory, c->iniFile.getKey("directories.import")) + parts[0];
00019         DIR* dp = opendir(location.c_str());
00020         if(dp != NULL) {
00021                 while(ep = readdir(dp)) {
00022                         if(ep->d_name[0] == '.')
00023                                 continue;
00024                         
00025                         string filepath = location + "/" + ep->d_name;
00026                         if(alreadyImported(c, filepath))
00027                                 continue;
00028                         
00029                         // we have to take 1 off the line number to negate the ++lineNumber in compileFile
00030                         // becuase there is a import for all files, not just one.
00031                         --c->lineNumber;
00032                         if(compiling)
00033                                 compileFile(c, filepath, MAVEN_ONLY_COMPILE);
00034                         else compileFile(c, filepath, MAVEN_ONLY_MAP);
00035                 }
00036                 closedir(dp);
00037                 return true;
00038         } else {
00039                 cout << "Error import location " << location << endl;
00040                 exit(1);
00041         }
00042         
00043         return false;
00044 }
